General.Name: Sawit Sumbermas Sarana Tbk
General.Description: PT Sawit Sumbermas Sarana Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the production and sale of crude palm oil, fresh fruit bunches, palm kernel oil, and palm kernel in Indonesia and internationally. The company operates 23 palm oil estates, 8 palm oil mills, and 1 biogas plant. It is also involved in the provision of consulting and trading services. The company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Pangkalan Bun, Indonesia. PT Sawit Sumbermas Sarana Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Citra Borneo Indah.
General.Address: Jalan H. Udan Said No. 47, Pangkalan Bun, Indonesia, 74113
